synopsis.text: Having lost her memories, Fūka finds herself alone in an unfamiliar town, unaware that she is being pursued by unknown forces. Seeking refuge, she is rescued by the Oz Family, one of the mafia syndicates that secretly controls the town. Now under their protection yet still lacking answers about her forgotten past, Fūka must navigate complex relationships in a city where loyalty and betrayal often intertwine. Will she uncover the truth behind the Oz Family's mysterious interest in her? And what forgotten secrets lie locked within her lost memories? Though the path forward remains unclear, this chance encounter sets Fūka on a dangerous journey to reclaim her identity in a town where little is as it seems.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
